text:
"Trailer Park Boys" is a Canadian mockumentary created by Mike Clattenburg. It is produced by Mike Clattenburg, Barrie Dunn and Michael Volpe. In Canada, it was shown on the Showcase. The series had thirteen seasons and ran from 22 April 2001 to 7 December 2008. It then restarted on 5 September 2014 and has continued to present.
The television programme has spawned three movies: "Trailer Park Boys: The Movie" on 6 October 2006, "Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day" in 25 September 2009, and "Trailer Park Boys: Don't Legalize It".
TV.com rated the series a 10.
